message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Your turn to be fair. This is a good deal before inflation eats into it.
I'll meet you halfway on the last offer, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Time is running out, and the money is shrinking. I'm moving closer to your offer, let's make a deal.
You're getting closer, but I still think I can get a bit more. Inflation is hurting me more, so I'm not backing down yet
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Take it before inflation destroys the deal for both of us!
